name: Midnight Recording Session
description:
A rhythm game about working overtime to meet a deadline

You've been slacking off, so your best friend roommate production partner and producer has locked you inside your recording studio until you finish all of the songs for your next release!

Bugs are still being patched...

Controls

Arrow Keys/WASDDirectional InputSpace/XButton 1CButton 2= (in level select)Unlock next song-Mute audio1 - 5Resize windowReturnPause

Credits

ZahranW- Programming - Design - Music

KingW - Graphics
